forum.content:
First of all, sorry for the poor English. I wanna practice conversation with someone or chat each other in English. Hope can add skype or line to add friend s , my skype account is "jaychung0722", and before you add me, please mention who you are and where did you see, feel free to add me , thanks！
PS. the time after my job is about 7:00pm, so the best practice time is after 7:30pm. Basically, I have free time on the weekend
forum.title: find someone can chat each other on skype or line to improve English skills
